Name: Lewd Island - Season 1
About the game: Welcome to Lewd Island , a beautiful island surrounded by unexpected secrets and a breeze of exciting romance in the air. Explore its beaches with Bella, a female companion who survived a plane crash with you. As you unravel its secrets, build your relationship with her and find out what is hidden in the paradise of Lewd Island. Is help arriving? Can you survive and find a way out? Other gameplay features: Exciting visuals and animations: Dive into the world of Lewd Island with 6400+ images and 180+ animations. A romantic story full of surprises: ...filled with plenty of humor and romance, and a little bit of the secret ingredient - love. And this is not the end: Check out the latest updates on Lewd Island Season 2 and our other games on xRed Twitter and Discord!
